message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires, is priced at $1,150,000. My goal is to ensure that we achieve a fair transaction that maximizes the benefits for both parties involved. I believe this price offers an excellent balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and your valuation of it. Let's work together to make this deal happen.
